Dont-Call-Me-Runt was a member of the Guild from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Runt was a halfling man with brown skin, green eyes, and dark brown hair gathered in cornrows. He wore an archers leathers dyed in the Guilds green colors and carried a bow.
In the , Runt was tasked with standing guard at the secret entrance into Baldurs Gates Undercellar, where the Guilds Guildhall was hidden. Whilst a half-orcish enforcer Tusgront manned the main entrance, Dont-Call-Me-Runt was ready to dispatch any unwanted guest from a distance.
